EmailTemplate.name: CR 13.1 Practitioner CF availability request
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Opportunities for September
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for all of your hard work over the summer; we hope that you have enjoyed working as a Practitioner on the programme. Your contribution has been invaluable.
If you would like to continue to work for NCS with The Challenge we are looking for people with availability throughout September weekends to undertake the Community Facilitator role.
As a Community Facilitator (CF), you will spend up to four weekends in September supporting the teams of young people as they complete the Community project which they designed over the summer. It is a great opportunity to see the young people complete the final part of the programme.
This is a non-residential role, available across all Greater London boroughs and Surrey.
If you are available in this opportunity, please register your interest for the role below.
Register your Interest https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/BVH2RK2
For more information on the Community Facilitator role please feel free to contact me on summerlongroles@the-challenge.org
Best wishes,
NCS with The Challenge summerlongroles@the-challenge.org CR 13.1
